Puma concolor: A large tawny cat with a slender body, small rounded head, powerful limbs, long tail with darker tip, short uniformly colored fur, and subtle facial markings.
Panthera onca: A robust big cat with a muscular build, golden-yellow coat covered in black rosettes each with a central spot, broad head, short limbs, and powerful jaw.
Odocoileus virginianus: A medium-sized deer with reddish-brown fur in summer and grayish-brown in winter, white throat and underside, large ears, slender legs, and a tail with white underside that flares when alarmed.
Zebra: A large herbivorous mammal with distinctive black-and-white striped coat, sturdy body, long legs, mane running along the neck, and a tufted tail.
